mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Transports (id, number, fuel) VALUES (#{id}, #{number}, #{fuel})
mapper.select:
select tr.id as transport_id, tr.number as transport_number, tr.fuel as transport_fuel, st.id as stop_id, st.number as stop_number, ci.id as city_id, ci.city as city_name, co.id as country_id, co.country as country_name, dr.id as driver_id, dr.name as driver_name, dr.second_name as driver_secondName, l.id as license_id, l.DL as dl, l.class as class, l.EXP as exp, l.END as end, t.id as type_id, t.type as type_name FROM Transport tr LEFT OUTER JOIN Stops st ON tr.Stop_from = st.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Stops stp ON tr.Stop_from = stp.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Drivers dr ON tr.Drivers_id = dr.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Licenses l ON dr.Lisences_id = l.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Type t ON tr.Type_id = t.id
WHERE tr.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE Transport SET number=#{number}, fuel=#{fuel} WHERE id=#{id}
